name: Fisikal
overview:
Fisikal is a technology developer and vendor that creates innovative online business management solutions for health professionals via Software-as-a-Service (SaaS).

These services enable health professionals to monetize client / patient relationships whilst increase their levels of productivity and service.

Our vision is to become the technology that powers the health industry.

Fisikal has 4 areas of interest:

â€¢ Nutrition (dieticians, nutritionists)

â€¢ Rehabilitation (chiropractors, physiotherapists, osteopaths, physical therapists)

â€¢ Coaching (life, corporate, performance)
